message.content:
The pattern seems to move the non-zero part of the sequence to the right by one place, shifting the following zero to its left. Here is the function:

```python
def transform(sequence):
    position = sequence.rfind('0', 0, sequence.rfind('0'))
    return sequence[:position] + sequence[position+1:] + sequence[position:position+1]
```

The pattern seems to move the non-zero part of the sequence to the right by one place, shifting the following zero to its left. Here is the function:

```python
def transform(sequence):
    position = sequence.rfind('0', 0, sequence.rfind('0'))
    return sequence[:position] + sequence[position+1:] + sequence[position:position+1]
```
